snippet.title: Hero of Allacrost - Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
Small video to show what Hero of Allacrost looks like in its current development, video feature the demo 1.0.2 version. Hero of Allacrost is a single player 2D role-playing game inspired by classic console RPGs. A nice thing with Allacrost is that the gameplay in-battle is using an active-time based system. This make the fighting a lot more interesting and it definitely keep you on the edge at early levels.

Hero of Allacrost is a Free and Open Source game, available for Linux, Mac OSX and Windows. Grab it at http://www.allacrost.org/download and share with us your Allacrost's pics and tricks at http://gameboom.net/games/hero-allacrost
